column1: Create a 1-hour team sync on May 5, 2025 from 10:00 to 11:00 in Europe/Amsterdam timezone.
Schedule a doctor’s appointment next Tuesday at 15:30 for 30 minutes.
Book “Project kickoff” tomorrow at 09:00 and add a Google Meet link.
Add an event called “Mom’s birthday” on 2025-06-14 all day, with a popup reminder 1440 minutes before.
Set up a recurring weekly stand-up every Monday at 08:30 for the next three months.
What do I have on my calendar this afternoon?
Show me my next five upcoming events.
Retrieve the details of event with ID abc123xyz.
Cancel the “Budget review” meeting happening on 2025-04-29 at 14:00.
